Career Advancement: I would want to see my career path clearly laid out with opportunities for growth and advancement. This would help me make informed decisions about my education and skill development, so that I can work towards my desired career goals.

Financial Security: I would want to see my financial future, including my income, expenses, and savings. This would help me make informed decisions about my investments, budgeting, and retirement planning.

Personal Relationships: I would want to see my personal relationships, including friendships, romantic relationships, and family relationships. This would help me understand how my relationships are evolving and how I can work to strengthen them.

Health and Wellness: I would want to see my health and wellness future, including my physical and mental health. This would help me make informed decisions about my lifestyle choices, such as exercise, diet, and stress management.

Travel and Adventure: I would want to see my travel and adventure future, including the places I would like to visit and the experiences I would like to have. This would help me plan my trips and make the most of my time off work.
